## Team Navigator Demo
This demonstrates the new Navigator component with the Comm360 team. The left panel shows a searchable list of team members, click to see details on the right.

## Key Features
- **Two-pane layout**: List on left, details on right - **Search functionality**: Filter team members by name or role - **Click to explore**: Encourages active learning through interaction - **Modular components**: TeamPreview and TeamDetail components can be reused - **YAML data format**: Easy to author and modify team information
